channel.title: Comments on: Internet Is a Mainstream Lifestyle, Finally

item.title: By: john@podtech.net
item.dc:creator: john@podtech.net
item.description:
Thanks for refering to the podcast. Thereisa is very plugged in to user generated web 2.0 media. There is more podcasts from her on PodTech.
btw: i like your blog
